Description:
RequirementsBachelor's degree in Business Administration, Logistics, or a related field.
Minimum of 5 years of experience in warehouse management.
Excellent leadership, organizational, and communication skills.
Strong knowledge of inventory management and distribution.
Ability to analyze data and make informed decisions.
Familiarity with management software, such as SAP or Oracle.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.Job Details
